pkgmetadata.longdescription: django-strict-fields########################################################################This library is meant to help enforce stricter rules around using some of the basic model fields that Django provides.View the docs `here <https://django-strict-fields.readthedocs.io/>`_ to get started.Compatibility=============``django-strict-fields`` is compatible with Python 3.7 - 3.11 and Django 3.2 - 4.2.Documentation=============`View the django-strict-fields docs here<https://django-strict-fields.readthedocs.io/>`_.Installation============Install django-strict-fields with:: pip3 install django-strict-fieldsAfter this, add ``strict_fields`` to the ``INSTALLED_APPS``setting of your Django project.Contributing Guide==================For information on setting up django-strict-fields for development andcontributing changes, view `CONTRIBUTING.rst <CONTRIBUTING.rst>`_.Primary Authors===============* @tomage: Tómas Árni Jónasson
